Award: OCE-1131657

Collaborative Research: Iron Regulation of the Food Quality of Phytoplankton in Acidified Eastern Boundary Upwelling Systems

Funding by NSF Division of Ocean Sciences (NSF OCE)

Oct. 27 2019 - Dec. 31 2022 Data Submitted

People

Program Manager: Henrietta N Edmonds

Principal Investigator: William P. Cochlan (San Francisco State University)

Projects funded by this award

  • Collaborative Research: Iron Regulation of the Food Quality of Phytoplankton In Acidified Eastern Boundary Upwelling Systems

Related Datasets

Southern Ocean 2001 moorings: current data from ARSV Laurence M. Gould LMG0103, LMG0201A in the Southern Ocean from 2001-2002 (SOGLOBEC project)
